mapper.insert: insert into t_course(name, credit, teacher, courseYear, term) values (#{name}, #{credit}, #{teacher}, #{courseYear}, #{term})

insert into t_course_info(course, courseType, weekType, beginWeek, lengthWeek, weekDay, begin, length, address) values
(#{courseId},#{item.courseType},#{item.weekType},#{item.beginWeek},#{item.lengthWeek},#{item.weekDay},#{item.begin},#{item.length},#{item.address})
insert into t_building (number, name, buildingType) values (#{number}, #{name}, #{buildingType});
insert into t_room (number, name, building, capacity, roomType) values (#{number}, #{name}, #{building}, #{capacity}, #{roomType});
insert into t_year(year, name) values (#{year}, CONCAT_WS('-', #{year}, #{year} + 1))

insert into t_teach_evaluate(elective, student, attitude, prepare, content, method, thinking, talk, tool, coaching, composite, remark) values (#{elective}, #{student}, #{attitude}, #{prepare}, #{content}, #{method}, #{thinking}, #{talk}, #{tool}, #{coaching}, #{composite}, #{remark})
insert into t_calendar(year, term, start, end, holiday) VALUES (#{year}, #{term}, #{start}, #{end}, #{holiday})
